   window.__ISSUU_HEADER_CONFIG__ = {"pageId":"anon_home","hosts":{"api":"api.issuu.com","main":"issuu.com","photo":"photo.isu.pub","pingback":"pingback.issuu.com"},"sentry":{"dsn":"https://a60a26eba1e642519b43545f6be1d2b0@sentry.issuu.com/139","release":"product-header-frontend@13","environment":"prod"}}
  </script>
  <script async="" src="//static.isu.pub/fe/product-header-frontend/13/header.js">
  </script>
  <div class="wrapper">
   <div class="modulesContainer">
    <div class="container-fluid hero-rotate js-hero-rotate" style="background-color: #FFF">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="hero-rotate__col col-md-12 col-lg-6 col-xl-5 p-4 px-md-0">
       <div class="hero-rotate__info">
        <h1 class="hero-rotate__info__heading">
         Convert your static PDFs into
        </h1>
        <div class="hero-rotate__info__rotating-text js-hero-rotate__info__rotating-text" data-list='["Instagram stories","embeddable flipbooks","mobile-ready articles","digital magazines","lookbooks","digital brochures","GIFs","digital flyers","digital pamphlets","Pinterest-ready videos","social stories","so much more","Facebook content","sales collateral"]'>
         <div class="hero-rotate__info__rotating-text__content">
          <span class="js-hero-rotate__info__rotating-text__content">
          </span>
          <span class="hero-rotate__info__rotating-text__content__blinker">
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="hero-rotate__info__rotating-text__line js-hero-rotate__info__rotating-text__line">
          <svg viewbox="0 0 266 11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <g>
            <path d="M10,26c35-7.12,254.84-13.72,263,0" transform="translate(-8.5 -16.5)">
            </path>
           </g>
          </svg>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="hero-rotate__info__content">
         <p>
          Your all-in-one content system with every tool you need
         </p>
        </div>
        <a class=" ixu-button ixu-button--pronounced js-cta-button-link" href="https://issuu.com/pricing?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage" title="Get Started">
         Get Started
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="hero-rotate__col col-md-12 col-lg-6 col-xl-7">
       <div class="hero-rotate__image">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/LZ6jQhnVtLLbyd2B1Zp8X/ff44cdaa2a51ceaa81b1bd69dbf10c24/devices_traveltreasures.png?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
          <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/LZ6jQhnVtLLbyd2B1Zp8X/ff44cdaa2a51ceaa81b1bd69dbf10c24/devices_traveltreasures.png" type="image/png">
           <img alt="Convert your static PDFs into Instagram stories, embeddable flipbooks, mobile-ready articles, digital magazines, lookbooks, digital brochures, GIFs, digital flyers, digital pamphlets, Pinterest-ready videos, social stories, so much more, Facebook content or sales collateral" class="hero-rotate__image__img lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/LZ6jQhnVtLLbyd2B1Zp8X/ff44cdaa2a51ceaa81b1bd69dbf10c24/devices_traveltreasures.png" draggable="false" height="678" title="Convert your static PDFs into Instagram stories, embeddable flipbooks, mobile-ready articles, digital magazines, lookbooks, digital brochures, GIFs, digital flyers, digital pamphlets, Pinterest-ready videos, social stories, so much more, Facebook content or sales collateral" width="1159"/>
          </source>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <div class="hero-rotate__image__content">
         <p>
          Want to check out our content?
          <a href="https://issuu.com/explore" target="_blank">
           EXPLORE HERE
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="moduleBackground">
     <div class="module">
      <div class="moduleBody">
       <div class="side-by-side">
        <div class="side-by-side__columns">
         <div class="side-by-side__column order-2 order-sm-1 py-3 py-sm-0">
          <picture>
           <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/1eyPgCfRWYHZYJ4bTWZmkg/e4b8a6ce7214b2417ca880c2889bdc9d/benefit-left-right-impression.jpg?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
            <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/1eyPgCfRWYHZYJ4bTWZmkg/e4b8a6ce7214b2417ca880c2889bdc9d/benefit-left-right-impression.jpg?fm=jpg&amp;fl=progressive" type="image/jpeg">
             <img alt="When you need to make an impression" class="fit lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/1eyPgCfRWYHZYJ4bTWZmkg/e4b8a6ce7214b2417ca880c2889bdc9d/benefit-left-right-impression.jpg" draggable="false" height="457" title="When you need to make an impression" width="800"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </div>
         <div class="side-by-side__column order-1 order-sm-2">
          <h2>
           When you need to make an impression
          </h2>
          <div class="side-by-side__column__content">
           <p>
            A digital publishing innovator, Issuu is the only platform loved by marketers and creatives, educators and editors around the world since 2008.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="moduleBackground">
     <div class="module">
      <div class="moduleBody">
       <div class="side-by-side">
        <div class="side-by-side__columns isReversed">
         <div class="side-by-side__column order-2 order-sm-1 py-3 py-sm-0">
          <picture>
           <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/c3hH6IcBvL1NEqihQcIoO/007578057cb1c834330e680a9a7ab597/benefit-right-left-distribute-everywhere.jpg?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
            <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/c3hH6IcBvL1NEqihQcIoO/007578057cb1c834330e680a9a7ab597/benefit-right-left-distribute-everywhere.jpg?fm=jpg&amp;fl=progressive" type="image/jpeg">
             <img alt="Create it once, distribute it everywhere " class="fit lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/c3hH6IcBvL1NEqihQcIoO/007578057cb1c834330e680a9a7ab597/benefit-right-left-distribute-everywhere.jpg" draggable="false" height="442" title="Create it once, distribute it everywhere " width="800"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </div>
         <div class="side-by-side__column order-1 order-sm-2">
          <h2>
           Create it once, distribute it everywhere
          </h2>
          <div class="side-by-side__column__content">
           <p>
            How does Issuu work? We take your PDF, images and text and transform them using your design and Issuu's templates to give you a native experience on desktop, mobile web, app, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest and all other social media.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="moduleBackground" style="background-color: #F9F9F9;">
     <div class="module">
      <div class="moduleBody">
       <div class="benefit__list">
        <div class="benefit__entry">
         <div class="benefit__entry-icon">
          <picture>
           <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/3B0rEEFkIHqO2wzEHQ3E6l/a27ccb2343189e45dec4b91074cde277/benefit-create-icon.png?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
            <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/3B0rEEFkIHqO2wzEHQ3E6l/a27ccb2343189e45dec4b91074cde277/benefit-create-icon.png" type="image/png">
             <img alt="Create high-quality content" class="fit benefit__entry-icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/3B0rEEFkIHqO2wzEHQ3E6l/a27ccb2343189e45dec4b91074cde277/benefit-create-icon.png" draggable="false" height="300" title="Create high-quality content" width="300"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </div>
         <div class="benefit__entry-details">
          <h3 class="ixu-heading--small">
           Create high-quality content
          </h3>
          <div class="benefit__entry-description">
           <p>
            Get high-quality assets in a few clicks — including Facebook Stories, Instagram Stories and Twitter- and Pinterest-ready videos. Stories across every channel, every format, and every spec.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="benefit__entry">
         <div class="benefit__entry-icon">
          <picture>
           <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/7stmFdIn2TGjDg1nMD04jF/a4f77c58eba7ad725ff53234da9c3bbb/benefit-distribute-icon.png?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
            <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/7stmFdIn2TGjDg1nMD04jF/a4f77c58eba7ad725ff53234da9c3bbb/benefit-distribute-icon.png" type="image/png">
             <img alt="Distribute it everywhere" class="fit benefit__entry-icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/7stmFdIn2TGjDg1nMD04jF/a4f77c58eba7ad725ff53234da9c3bbb/benefit-distribute-icon.png" draggable="false" height="300" title="Distribute it everywhere" width="300"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </div>
         <div class="benefit__entry-details">
          <h3 class="ixu-heading--small">
           Distribute it everywhere
          </h3>
          <div class="benefit__entry-description">
           <p>
            Easily share pixel-perfect, platform-optimized content to Instagram, Facebook, Apple News, and more.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="benefit__entry">
         <div class="benefit__entry-icon">
          <picture>
           <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/293J2ykamH7iZNSOfeZ8HW/fa0db2e583be271008ebe90128fda88b/benefit-reach-icon.png?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
            <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/293J2ykamH7iZNSOfeZ8HW/fa0db2e583be271008ebe90128fda88b/benefit-reach-icon.png" type="image/png">
             <img alt="Reach more people" class="fit benefit__entry-icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/293J2ykamH7iZNSOfeZ8HW/fa0db2e583be271008ebe90128fda88b/benefit-reach-icon.png" draggable="false" height="300" title="Reach more people" width="300"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </div>
         <div class="benefit__entry-details">
          <h3 class="ixu-heading--small">
           Reach more people
          </h3>
          <div class="benefit__entry-description">
           <p>
            Upgrade your Search presence by making your content searchable. Plus, automatically optimize for Google Accelerated Mobile Pages (
            <a href="/features/google-amp" target="_blank">
            </a>
            <a href="https://issuu.com/features/google-amp" target="_blank">
             AMP
            </a>
            ), the standard for mobile.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="benefit__entry">
         <div class="benefit__entry-icon">
          <picture>
           <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/5eolRppN2gd4I6vDfbWoDp/76880c2526b465d5ad9581cda8f6c6b9/benefit-make-icon.png?fm=webp" type="image/webp">
            <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/5eolRppN2gd4I6vDfbWoDp/76880c2526b465d5ad9581cda8f6c6b9/benefit-make-icon.png" type="image/png">
             <img alt="Make more money" class="fit benefit__entry-icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/5eolRppN2gd4I6vDfbWoDp/76880c2526b465d5ad9581cda8f6c6b9/benefit-make-icon.png" draggable="false" height="300" title="Make more money" width="300"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </picture>
         </div>
         <div class="benefit__entry-details">
          <h3 class="ixu-heading--small">
           Make more money
          </h3>
          <div class="benefit__entry-description">
           <p>
            Sell single issues or subscriptions of magazines, eBooks, reports, and more — on your site or your social channels. And use Issuu
            <a href="https://issuu.com/features/analytics" target="_blank">
             analytics
            </a>
            to drive revenue with advertisers.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="numbers full-width" style="background-image: url('//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/471lnPsqaqvZGafO3mF09G/021d0fafb3f63635d354f6b3eba80859/generic_email_banner.jpg');">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="row py-5">

    <div class="container py-5">
     <div class="row align-items-center pb-2">
      <div class="col">
       <h2 class="key-uses__headline">
        Create and Share - Monetize and Measure
       </h2>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row key-uses mt-2">
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-medium">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/designers?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/P4GP1WZIJ6ZC3nU0wcbpU/cdfa2c193e960d67ee79c138d421f8c0/icon_designers_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Designers" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/P4GP1WZIJ6ZC3nU0wcbpU/cdfa2c193e960d67ee79c138d421f8c0/icon_designers_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Designers" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Designers
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Dramatically reduce production time.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-none">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/content-marketers?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/1q86yuuUDkFU3V4qIWLewB/4e2c0f582555353f9295933b771af39c/icon_marketers_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Marketers" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/1q86yuuUDkFU3V4qIWLewB/4e2c0f582555353f9295933b771af39c/icon_marketers_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Marketers" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Marketers
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Maximize your digital efforts.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-medium">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/social-media-managers?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/wdXLiZTNsnWC9VeYvGZGL/4db97205194aa16aa3baf45fe4e2a343/icon_socmedmanagers_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Social Media Managers" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/wdXLiZTNsnWC9VeYvGZGL/4db97205194aa16aa3baf45fe4e2a343/icon_socmedmanagers_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Social Media Managers" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Social Media Managers
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Build a better social presence.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-none">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/publishers?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/6uLLrE2ZDgVK7BzgyxS07d/ba0ad671e5eb5d146ff6212cd5600243/icon_publishers_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Publishers" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/6uLLrE2ZDgVK7BzgyxS07d/ba0ad671e5eb5d146ff6212cd5600243/icon_publishers_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Publishers" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Publishers
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Drive readership for less.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-medium">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/corporate-communication?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2ENypRxp4jfvccOIyI2G7/e9271ca10e8dcac21a0d2574cb26d047/icon_PR_Copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="PR/Corp Comm" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2ENypRxp4jfvccOIyI2G7/e9271ca10e8dcac21a0d2574cb26d047/icon_PR_Copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="PR/Corp Comm" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         PR/Corp Comm
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Get your message out — effectively.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-none">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/students-and-teachers?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2A7WkTIdXhsUuysxujAqIA/5835c33fdb96ad7e168044360ec36ece/icon_educators_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Educators" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2A7WkTIdXhsUuysxujAqIA/5835c33fdb96ad7e168044360ec36ece/icon_educators_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Educators" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Educators
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Promote your institution.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-medium">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/students-and-teachers?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/72titr2deXdztIyUuiciLd/e86ac50d0eca9528f5c0ac49a4fc7b33/icon_students_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Students" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/72titr2deXdztIyUuiciLd/e86ac50d0eca9528f5c0ac49a4fc7b33/icon_students_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Students" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Students
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Bring your projects to life.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-6 col-md-3 key-uses__entry offset-none">
       <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/salespeople?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage">
        <picture>
         <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2wsb6tUg5iy6uyBiPMsNRc/186b50d30bd08f710c217326c3084095/icon_salespeople_copy.svg" type="image/svg+xml">
          <img alt="Salespeople" class="key-uses__entry--icon lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2wsb6tUg5iy6uyBiPMsNRc/186b50d30bd08f710c217326c3084095/icon_salespeople_copy.svg" draggable="false" height="116" title="Salespeople" width="116"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
        <h4 class="key-uses__entry--title">
         Salespeople
        </h4>
        <div class="key-uses__entry--description">
         <p>
          Close more deals.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="explore full-width" style="background-color: #222;">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="col">
       <h2 class="explore__headline" style="background-color: #222;">
        Get Inspired
       </h2>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row">
      <div class="col pt-4">
       <div class="explore-glide" data-per-view="6">
        <div class="glide__arrows" data-glide-el="controls">
         <button class="glide__arrow glide__arrow--left" data-glide-dir="&lt;">
          <svg fill="none" height="24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <polyline points="15 18 9 12 15 6">
           </polyline>
          </svg>
         </button>
         <button class="glide__arrow glide__arrow--right" data-glide-dir="&gt;">
          <svg fill="none" height="24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <polyline points="9 18 15 12 9 6">
           </polyline>
          </svg>
         </button>
        </div>
        <div class="glide__track" data-glide-el="track">
         <ul class="glide__slides">
          <li class="glide__slide">
           <div class="explore__carousel-item">
            <a href="https://amp.issuu.com/visual-stories/N4REo5bgvSg?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage" style="background-color: #222;" target="_blank" title="Catalog">
             <picture>
              <source data-srcset="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2JdhXueWDmXGzA0Bpp0hAT/f3c442d35f83e3b421c1ecf6eb30d424/inspire-vs-catalog.jpg?fm=webp" type="image/webp">

                <img alt="Catalog" class="explore__carousel-item__image lazy" data-src="//images.ctfassets.net/xvqp5pvs1vfv/2JdhXueWDmXGzA0Bpp0hAT/f3c442d35f83e3b421c1ecf6eb30d424/inspire-vs-catalog.jpg" draggable="false" height="558" title="Catalog" width="322"/>
               </source>
              </source>
             </picture>

            </a>

          </li>

     <div class="row justify-content-center pb-4">
      <a class="explore__explore-link" href="https://issuu.com/explore?issuu_product=anonymous-homepage&amp;issuu_context=explore-module" title="Explore">

      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="logo-parade container py-4">
     <div class="row pt-4">
      <div class="col">
       <div class="logo-parade__introduction">
        <h2>
         Used in industries such as:
        </h2>
        <p>
         <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/real-estate" target="_blank">
          Real Estate
         </a>
         ,
         <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/travel" target="_blank">
          Travel
         </a>
         ,
         <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/sports" target="_blank">
          Sports
         </a>
         ,
         <a href="https://issuu.com/publishing/publishers" target="_blank">
          Publishing
         </a>
         and more.
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>

.if-MainLinks-sectionLinks a{font-size:calc(11.27273px + .22727vw)}}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){.if-ExploreLinks-sectionLinks .ixu-cascading-fluid-typography a,.if-ExploreLinks-sectionLinks svg,.if-LegalLinks a svg,.if-MainLinks-sectionLinks a svg{width:16px;height:16px;fill:#bbb;margin-right:6px}.if-SocialLinks{display:flex;justify-content:space-around}.if-bottom-bar-stacked .if-Wrapper--bottom{background:#fff}.if-WidthLimiter{max-width:1400px;margin:0 auto}.if-TopSection{display:flex;width:100%}

   </style>

        <div class="if-ExploreLinks-sectionHeader">
         Explore Issuu Content
        </div>

         <div class="if-ExploreLinks">

           <li>
            <a class="if-ExploreLink" href="https://issuu.com/categories/arts-and-entertainment?issuu_product=footer&amp;issuu_subproduct=explore&amp;issuu_context=link" title="Explore Arts &amp; Entertainment">

            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="if-ExploreLink" href="https://issuu.com/categories/business?issuu_product=footer&amp;issuu_subproduct=explore&amp;issuu_context=link" title="Explore Business">

            </a>

             Education
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="if-ExploreLink" href="https://issuu.com/categories/family-and-parenting?issuu_product=footer&amp;issuu_subproduct=explore&amp;issuu_context=link" title="Explore Family &amp; Parenting">
             Family &amp; Parenting
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="if-ExploreLink" href="https://issuu.com/categories/food-and-drink?issuu_product=footer&amp;issuu_subproduct=explore&amp;issuu_context=link" title="Explore Food &amp; Drink">
             Food &amp; Drink
            </a>
